### Tutorial


First install 
```{r}
#code to install package from github
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
#install package
install_github("stp4freedom/HW4_GLM_GWAS")
#load library
library(GWAStest)#package name
phenotypes_n_1=phenotypes[,2]
a = GWASapply(phenotypes_n_1,genotypes,CV,GM,PCA.M = 3)




library(mgcv)
library(knitr)
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
```
